pkgmetadata.longdescription: The C Interface to 'BLAS' Routines // Provides the 'cblas.h' header file as C interface to the underlying internal 'BLAS' library in R. 'CBLAS' https://www.netlib.org/blas/cblas.h is a collection of wrappers originally written by Keita Teranishi and provides a C interface to the FORTRAN 'BLAS' library https://www.netlib.org/blas/. Note that as internal 'BLAS' library provided by R https://svn.r-project.org/R/trunk/src/include/R_ext/BLAS.h is used and only the double precision / double complex 'BLAS' routines are supported.
